item.title: Beyond Accuracy: Ensuring Correct Predictions With Correct Rationales
item.description: This research introduces a novel two-phase approach to improve AI model trustworthiness by ensuring both correct predictions and correct rationales. A new dataset with structured rationales and a rat…
